plot outline: Sangeeta is about to get married soon she is admitted to a hospital in Pune.But is unwilling to sign the consent form after speaking to Dr Smita and Dr Suren she is convinced to undergo surgery on her ovaries.The surgery is to be performed by Dr Khurana whose mentor of Smita.Dr Khurana advises Smita to perform the surgery as he feels distracted in the operation theater one of Sangeeta's ovary is diagnosed with cancer while the other has no verdict.Dr Khurana asks Smita to remove both her ovaries but she refuses citing medical norms this angers Dr Khurana and he asks Dr Budhkar to complete the surgery.After surgery Smita writes a remark on patient's file which will whole hospital administration into trouble.
title: Aaghaat
plot: A young medical student fights against negligence done by senior and powerful doctor

Sangeeta is about to get married soon she is admitted to a hospital in Pune.But is unwilling to sign the consent form after speaking to Dr Smita and Dr Suren she is convinced to undergo surgery on her ovaries.The surgery is to be performed by Dr Khurana whose mentor of Smita.Dr Khurana advises Smita to perform the surgery as he feels distracted in the operation theater one of Sangeeta's ovary is diagnosed with cancer while the other has no verdict.Dr Khurana asks Smita to remove both her ovaries but she refuses citing medical norms this angers Dr Khurana and he asks Dr Budhkar to complete the surgery.After surgery Smita writes a remark on patient's file which will whole hospital administration into trouble.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
